item.title: Vietnam: Muine windsurf seasons
item.description:
Vietnam: Muine windsurf seasons

Welcome to Mui Ne Vietnam, one of the best windsurfing locations in Asia, offering amazing conditions for complete beginners and pro level riders. Mui Ne can be split up into two wind seasons. 1) November-May brings regular strong cross on shore winds (10-28+ knots).

item.title: Vietnam: Muine windsurf competitions
item.description:
Vietnam: Muine windsurf competitions

The windsurf scene in Mui Ne is well established with a number of schools offering equipment rental. There are a number armature windsurf competitions being held throughout the high season in Mui Ne, we even hosted the 2011 PWA World Tour. 2017 seasons Mui Ne windsurf events.

item.title: Vietnam: where windsurf dreams are made
item.description:
Vietnam: where windsurf dreams are made

Muine in Vietnam is one of the best windsurfing locations in Asia, offering amazing conditions for complete beginners and pro level riders. Muine for beginners: Flat water and light wind is what every beginner needs and that is what you'll get, morning time is beginner time.

item.title: Dany Bruch Summer 2016
item.description:
Dany Bruch Summer 2016

After an average result at the PWA event at home, were I finished 7th, it was time to focus on the next events and give it all to improve many things, specially the double forwards!

item.title: Windsurfing. Greece, Kos. Shapkina Maria RUS 6
item.description:
Windsurfing. Greece, Kos. Shapkina Maria RUS 6

Shapkina Maria RUS6 катается в Греции, о. Кос, Кефалос. Станция "Ветратория"

item.title: Vietnam Fun Cup 2010
item.description:
Vietnam Fun Cup 2010

Video of the 11th Fun Cup, which took place from the 29.-30.1. 2010 at Jibe´s Beach Club in Mui Ne, Vietnam.

item.title: 15th Vietnam Fun Cup
item.description:
15th Vietnam Fun Cup

Fun Slalom race in Jibe's Beach Club, Mui Ne, Vietnam, 14th & 15th February 2014

item.title: 17th Vietnam Fun Cup
item.description:
17th Vietnam Fun Cup

Good fun with great people, see you on 17th & 18th Feb 2017 for the 18th edition

item.title: Home - Jibes Beach Club
item.description:
Home - Jibes Beach Club

Offers a wide spectrum of water sport activities and the best toys for everyone to enjoy, from kayaking or SUPing on flat calm mornings to hardcore kitesurfing and windsurfing in 25+ knots of the famous Mui Ne wind. Our experienced international instructors can teach you how to windsurf, kitesurf, surf or go sailing on a beach catamaran.
